page.title: 09CONCLUSIONS
page.content: {CONCLUSIONS} As a result of our visits to Smalley, and talks with local people we came to the following conclusions:- Smalley people are very friendly and helpful; the population is decreasing as families tend to be smaller; there is not much noise; old people would prefer more shops so they do not have to travel to Derby or Heanor; it seems a pleasant place to live; there is not much evidence of vandalism; to get a job is hard; there is too much traffic which makes it unsafe for children; there are no public toilets; there is plenty of countryside around; most houses have burglar alarms; a number of houses are for sale.
